broadwick.montecarlo

Class Producer

  • java.lang.Object
    • broadwick.montecarlo.Producer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    class Producer
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class runs a single simulation of the model to 'produce' results (hence the name). This runnable class is run many times to create a Monte Carlo simulation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Producer

        public Producer(ArrayBlockingQueue<MonteCarloResults> queue,
                MonteCarloScenario simulation,
                int numSimulations)
        Create the producer object.
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue on which the producers results are added.
        simulation - the model that will be run to produce results.
        numSimulations - the number of simulations that are to be run and placed in the quque.
